alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nassau and southeastern Charlton Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of St. George, or 17 miles southwest of Hilliard, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hilliard, Callahan, St. George, Kings Ferry and Nassau Village-Ratliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
